channel.title: Changes Donor Status On Log Out
channel.description: On my source, if I change a character to donor status, it will save on their file but as soon as they log out (after logging back in), it will change them to non donor :mad: . Anyone know how to fix this? I'm guessing it would be with a group of commands which occur on log out.

item.title: Changes Donor Status On Log Out
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“Barrick, post:2, topic:388629”]Try the “::givedonor (username)” Command

hope this helps…[/quote]
How can he give donor if he doesn’t have command?

anyway…
donor command:

if (command.startsWith("donar") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.donator = 1; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; sM("You just gave"+command.substring(4)+" donator"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); }

Read full topic
item.source: Changes Donor Status On Log Out

item.title: Changes Donor Status On Log Out
item.dc:creator: @westknight westknight
item.description:
@westknight wrote:

Ahh Vain, you were spot on :). Did some investigating and found that the name needed to be added to a list or it would reset status. Thanks for the help guys, it’s appreciated very much

Read full topic
item.source: Changes Donor Status On Log Out

item.title: Changes Donor Status On Log Out
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Make sure they have logged out when your editing their character files.

This is because, if they are logged in, and you edit the files, once they log out, the save will be over written.

Read full topic
item.source: Changes Donor Status On Log Out

item.title: Changes Donor Status On Log Out
item.dc:creator: @Barrick Barrick
item.description:
@Barrick wrote:

IS IT PI? ::givedonor, or I could give you the code.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givedonor")) { try { String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been given donator status by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 4; c2.isDonator = 1; c2.logout(); break;

Read full topic

Hmm, I’m running a Delta based source if that helps. I save the donor status to the character file… I can save and open back up and it will still say donor. However, when I log in to the account and log back out the donor status gets reset.

::givedonor doesn’t work
